name: Destine Nation - Play Your Dream Vacation
blurb: Virtual vacation planner free to play on Facebook. Plan - Travel - Invite - Brag - Compare - Collect - Share - Spend!

rewards.reward: Signed Destine Nation 'Thank You" post card by development team. (add $10 outside of U.S.)
SECRET NEWSLETTER - Be on our top secret e-newsletter list containing latest insider updates and secret info. Press is allowed to buy and publish this info. (add $10 outside of U.S.)

JUMPSTARTER - Kickstart us and we will jumpstart you in our game. We will give you unlocked locations, extra Destine Cash (ingame cloud money), extra 'Freakin Flyer Miles', and other unlockables, to start with. (Exact amounts is to be determined at a later time.) You don't have to start from the beginning. (add $10 outside of U.S.)
DEV TEAM SHIRT - Official physical Destine Nation development team member t-shirt and exclusive  e-newsletter subscription. (add $10 outside of U.S.)

Matching in-game avatar shirt (that will never be available for purchase), plus matching physical official Destine Nation development team member t-shirt for you and exclusive insider e-newsletter. (add $10 outside of U.S.)

LUXURY DESIGNER PACKAGE - (all in-game rewards for your avatar) Get designer luggage (with extra storage), free upgrade to 1st class flight, free upgrade to 5 star accommodations, free upgrades on car rental. Extra unlocked excursion option. Applies to 6 trips total. Be the envy of your friends.

ADVENTURER PACKAGE - You can invent an excursion in an available location around the world and name it after you. You will receive 10 free passes to share your excision in-game or use yourself. You can use this to advertize your business or just to make sure an amazing activity is available. Examples can be 'scuba dive Jellyfish Lake in Micronesia' or 'eat at Bobs Burger Stand in LA', etc...\r\n\r\nTo sweeten the deal we will also add a free in-game exotic sports car rental, special in-game t-shirt commemorating the excursion, and physical Destine Nation iPhone or iPad case.

GAME DEVELOPER PACKAGE - Be part of the game design process. Give input and take exclusive polls on art and game design decisions. Be an early beta tester. Decide what is in and what is out. Get limited exclusive Destine Nation iPad case. Be in the developer credits as a 'Game Designer'.

MEET THE TEAM! - Meet the development team, tour our studio, join us for lunch and dinner party. Come see exclusive unreleased art, and even unreleased projects. Join our development meetings and speak up on open topics! (Travel expenses such as airfare, car rental, accommodations, etc. are at backers own expense.)

BE IN OUR GAME! - Be immortalized in Destine Nation as a prominent background character. We will recreate your image in our art style. Your character will be appearing around the world as a pilot, or restauranteur, or greeter, or taxi driver, or bellboy or all of the above! In addition you can pick 5 of the previous rewards to add to being an in-game character. (Cannot duplicate 1 reward larger than $150 more than once.)
